ygData.subject: Hydras and Rodimus: watching from the sidelines
ygData.msgSnippet: Maxima came to. But the pain shot through her form. Her optics closed, she winced from the sharp pains. Then she attempted once more to get up. Cursing this

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Maxima came to. But the pain shot through her form. 

Her optics closed, she winced from the sharp pains. 

Then she attempted once more to get up. Cursing this form, Alpha Trion had 
set her up for this. Eventually, she hoped that she will regain her old style 
form very soon. Her forearms very weak, she made the attempt, but collapsed 
once more.

Wincing from the extra pain, her optics then glanced up as her audio 
receptors caught the dull sound of a battle. 

Indeed, it was a battle... between Rodimus & Hydras. 

Her optics caught the sight of the hit Hydras took. Her body jerked in 
response to join the attack or assist him. But.. the pain shot through, 
freezing her body. 

'No!' she told herself. She would not give up.. not like this. 

Again, she attempted to get up. Collapsing & attempting again & again. 

Finally, she stood part way, knelt in a crouch close to the ground. Panting, 
attempting to regain her strength. But, that was coming too slow. She laid 
down, only able to watch the battle between Hydras & Rodimus. She had to save 
her strength... she would need it for returning to the Predacon base. That is 
IF she could make it back to the base. 

--part1_71.2f5d291e.2bc0cd43_boundary
